# Library guidance

> Recommendations for creating high-quality NuGet packages and .NET libraries. Covers cross-platform targeting, versioning, strong naming, source linking, and publishing. Focus areas include stability, debuggability, and maintaining compatibility across releases.

- [Breaking changes and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/breaking-changes.md): Best practice recommendations for navigating breaking changes when creating .NET libraries.
- [Cross-platform targeting for .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/cross-platform-targeting.md): Best practice recommendations for creating cross-platform .NET libraries.
- [Dependencies and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/dependencies.md): Best practice recommendations for managing NuGet dependencies in .NET libraries.
- [Get started creating high-quality .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/get-started.md): Getting started building .NET libraries.
- [Library guidance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/index.md): Best practice recommendations for developers to create high quality .NET libraries.
- [NuGet and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/nuget.md): Best practice recommendations for packaging with NuGet for .NET libraries.
- [Publishing a NuGet package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/publish-nuget-package.md): Best practice recommendations for publishing .NET libraries to NuGet.
- [Source Link and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/sourcelink.md): Best practice recommendations for using Source Link to improve debugging for .NET libraries.
- [Strong naming and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/strong-naming.md): Best practice recommendations for strong naming .NET libraries.
- [Versioning and .NET libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/library-guidance/versioning.md): Best practice recommendations for versioning .NET libraries.
